last_episode_to_air.name: Life in Wartime
last_episode_to_air.overview: Mexican and US authorities search in earnest for Amado. While in prison, Chapo makes moves to show he's the boss. Enedina sends Ramón on a mission.

name: Narcos: Mexico
overview: See the rise of the Guadalajara Cartel as an American DEA agent learns the danger of targeting narcos in 1980s Mexico.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Witness the birth of the Mexican drug war in the 1980s as a gritty new "Narcos" saga chronicles the true story of the Guadalajara cartel's ascent.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Félix fights to maintain control of the cocaine trade, but the DEA’s thirst for revenge and feuding within his organization threaten his ambitions.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: As a new generation of cartel leaders vie for power, journalists hunt for truth while government agents walk a thin line between justice and corruption.

tagline: The uncut story of Mexico's first cartel.

episodes.name: Camelot
episodes.overview: When the army pillages ​Sinaloa, ​an ambitious pot farmer pitches a plan to build a drug empire in Guadalajara. A young DEA agent transfers to Mexico.

episodes.name: The Plaza System
episodes.overview: Félix tries to unite all of the plazas while Rafa searches for water for his seedless weed. Police corruption and the DEA’s complacency frustrate Kiki.

episodes.name: El Padrino
episodes.overview: Kiki flies solo on a risky undercover operation. Félix turns to his mentor for advice as conflict between the cops and the traffickers escalates.

episodes.name: Rafa, Rafa, Rafa!
episodes.overview: After months of frustration, Kiki seizes an opportunity. Rafa runs afoul of powerful government officials, putting Félix in a difficult position.

episodes.name: The Colombian Connection
episodes.overview: A threat leaves Mika shaken. Félix envisions a different kind of future for the Guadalajara cartel.

episodes.name: La Última Frontera
episodes.overview: A violent power struggle erupts between Falcón and Rafa. As Félix finds a footing in the cocaine business, the DEA tries to lure him into the U.S.

episodes.name: Jefe de Jefes
episodes.overview: María implores Félix to move back to Sinaloa. Kiki gathers evidence of the Guadalajara cartel’s pot fields. Neto mourns.

episodes.name: Just Say No
episodes.overview: After the DEA closes in on Rafa's enormous pot field, Félix tries to stop his associates from retaliating. Kiki and Jaime meet with investigators.

episodes.name: 881 Lope de Vega
episodes.overview: A desperate Jaime is stymied by bureaucratic paperwork. Mika worries about her husband. Félix urges Rafa to disappear.

episodes.name: Leyenda
episodes.overview: As pressure mounts, Félix returns to Sinaloa. An enraged Jaime and Mika seek justice and answers.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Witness the birth of the Mexican drug war in the 1980s as a gritty new "Narcos" saga chronicles the true story of the Guadalajara cartel's ascent.

episodes.name: Salva El Tigre
episodes.overview: While celebrating his 40th birthday, Félix worries about his associates' loyalty and confronts Pacho. Walt and his team plan retaliatory kidnappings.

episodes.name: Alea lacta Est
episodes.overview: Verdin taunts the DEA agents torturing him. Félix offers opium dealer Guerra a partnership deal. Benjamín's sister Enedina poses a new business idea.

episodes.name: Ruben Zuno Arce
episodes.overview: Multiple advisers counsel Félix to go into hiding as the Americans close in on the men involved in Kiki's murder. Amado helps Acosta resolve a feud.

episodes.name: The Big Dig
episodes.overview: Zuno testifies in front of a grand jury. Isabella tries to broker a deal with Enedina. Félix makes a daring offer to a U.S. contact.

episodes.name: AFO
episodes.overview: Calderoni briefs Walt on the tension between the plazas as Chapo continues construction of his tunnel. Félix's meeting with Pacho takes a turn.

episodes.name: El Dedazo
episodes.overview: Félix meets with a political leader. Benjamín takes a stand when the Sinaloa and Tijuana rivalry intensifies. Walt's team turns its attention to planes.

episodes.name: Truth and Reconciliation
episodes.overview: Félix proposes a new plan to help the PRI win the election and defeat Cárdenas. Promised intel on Félix, Walt takes an unexpected meeting in Ojinaga.

episodes.name: Se Cayó El Sistema
episodes.overview: Mexican authorities, the FBI and Félix all seek out Acosta after a newspaper publishes an interview with him. The presidential election begins.

episodes.name: Growth, Prosperity, and Liberation
episodes.overview: Félix stakes the future of his entire cartel on the delivery of 70 tons of cocaine as Walt and the DEA plan to topple the kingpin's empire.

episodes.name: Free Trade
episodes.overview: After meeting with Pacho, Félix presents the plaza bosses with a new business plan. Walt receives a surprising invitation.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Félix fights to maintain control of the cocaine trade, but the DEA’s thirst for revenge and feuding within his organization threaten his ambitions.

episodes.name: 12 Steps
episodes.overview: Walt's undercover mission takes a turn. Amado is released following three months in prison. Juárez police officer Victor looks for a missing girl.

episodes.name: Como La Flor
episodes.overview: Tijuana journalist Andréa takes an interest in the teen guests at the wedding between Enedina Arellano and a prominent attorney. Walt considers a move.

episodes.name: Los Juniors
episodes.overview: After a disappointing conversation with the Arellanos about purchasing land, the Sinaloa cartel reacts. Andréa continues investigating the narcojuniors.

episodes.name: GDL
episodes.overview: With the Tijuana and Sinaloa cartels at war, everyone wonders where Juárez stands, but Amado has other plans in Cuba. Ramón seeks revenge against Chapo.

episodes.name: Boots on the Ground
episodes.overview: Walt joins a Mexican task force led by Gen. Rebollo aimed at catching those responsible for the Guadalajara massacre and Cardinal Posada's death.

episodes.name: La Jefa
episodes.overview: Victor is shaken by a murder and takes action. Violence escalates in Tijuana. New boss Enedina develops a plan to challenge her cartel's rivals.

episodes.name: La Voz
episodes.overview: La Voz is targeted following its reporting on Colosio's assassins. Mayo and Chapo form an alliance against the Tijuana cartel. Victor asks questions.

episodes.name: Last Dance
episodes.overview: When torturing Alex doesn't work, Walt switches tactics. Andrea sifts through financial records tied to Hank and the PRI. Amado plans for the future.

episodes.name: The Reckoning
episodes.overview: Andrea uncovers a startling connection, instigating a cascade of events. With Alex's help, Walt closes in on Benjamín. Hank threatens Amado.

episodes.name: Life in Wartime
episodes.overview: Mexican and US authorities search in earnest for Amado. While in prison, Chapo makes moves to show he's the boss. Enedina sends Ramón on a mission.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: As a new generation of cartel leaders vie for power, journalists hunt for truth while government agents walk a thin line between justice and corruption.
